titleStmt.title: Of religious assemblies, and the publick service of God a discourse according to apostolicall rule and practice. / By Herbert Thorndike.
titleStmt.author: Thorndike, Herbert, 1598-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Roger Daniel Printer to the Vniversitie, and are to be sold at the Angel in Lombardstreet in London,

notesStmt.note: With a final leaf of errata.
Also issued as part of "Two discourses the one of primitive government of churches .." (Wing T1057).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
